source:
cw_FolderName = ""
ContainerName = ""
DataLakeDF = ""
Items = ""
FullLoad = ""
TempContainerName = ""
TakeOnPeriod = ""

# This cell is generated from runtime parameters. Learn more: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2161015
cw_FolderName = "Unstructured Data/TMS"
ContainerName = "synapse"
DataLakeDF = "citylogisticsstorageprod.dfs.core.windows.net/"
Items = "[{\"Source\":{\"TableName\":\"address\",\"SchemaName\":\"public\"},\"Increment\":{\"IncField\":\"moddate\",\"IdField\":\"id\"},\"Destination\":{\"FileName\":\"publicaddress\"},\"SparkConfig\":{\"NodeSize\":\"Small\",\"MinExecutors\":\"1\",\"MaxExecutors\":\"3\"}},{\"Source\":{\"TableName\":\"booking\",\"SchemaName\":\"public\"},\"Increment\":{\"IncField\":\"moddate\",\"IdField\":\"id\"},\"Destination\":{\"FileName\":\"publicbooking\"},\"SparkConfig\":{\"NodeSize\":\"Small\",\"MinExecutors\":\"1\",\"MaxExecutors\":\"3\"}},{\"Source\":{\"TableName\":\"customer\",\"SchemaName\":\"public\"},\"Increment\":{\"IncField\":\"moddate\",\"IdField\":\"id\"},\"Destination\":{\"FileName\":\"publiccustomer\"},\"SparkConfig\":{\"NodeSize\":\"Small\",\"MinExecutors\":\"1\",\"MaxExecutors\":\"3\"}},{\"Source\":{\"TableName\":\"driverpay\",\"SchemaName\":\"public\"},\"Increment\":{\"IncField\":\"moddate\",\"IdField\":\"id\"},\"Destination\":{\"FileName\":\"publicdriverpay\"},\"SparkConfig\":{\"NodeSize\":\"Small\",\"MinExecutors\":\"1\",\"MaxExecutors\":\"3\"}},{\"Source\":{\"TableName\":\"financedata\",\"SchemaName\":\"public\"},\"Increment\":{\"IncField\":\"moddate\",\"IdField\":\"id\"},\"Destination\":{\"FileName\":\"publicfinancedata\"},\"SparkConfig\":{\"NodeSize\":\"Small\",\"MinExecutors\":\"1\",\"MaxExecutors\":\"3\"}},{\"Source\":{\"TableName\":\"fuelcard\",\"SchemaName\":\"public\"},\"Increment\":{\"IncField\":\"moddate\",\"IdField\":\"id\"},\"Destination\":{\"FileName\":\"publicfuelcard\"},\"SparkConfig\":{\"NodeSize\":\"Small\",\"MinExecutors\":\"1\",\"MaxExecutors\":\"3\"}},{\"Source\":{\"TableName\":\"fuelzone\",\"SchemaName\":\"public\"},\"Increment\":{\"IncField\":\"moddate\",\"IdField\":\"id\"},\"Destination\":{\"FileName\":\"publicfuelzone\"},\"SparkConfig\":{\"NodeSize\":\"Small\",\"MinExecutors\":\"1\",\"MaxExecutors\":\"3\"}},{\"Source\":{\"TableName\":\"instruction\",\"SchemaName\":\"public\"},\"Increment\":{\"IncField\":\"moddate\",\"IdField\":\"id\"},\"Destination\":{\"FileName\":\"publicinstruction\"},\"SparkConfig\":{\"NodeSize\":\"Small\",\"MinExecutors\":\"1\",\"MaxExecutors\":\"3\"}},{\"Source\":{\"TableName\":\"invoiceitem\",\"SchemaName\":\"public\"},\"Increment\":{\"IncField\":\"moddate\",\"IdField\":\"id\"},\"Destination\":{\"FileName\":\"publicinvoiceitem\"},\"SparkConfig\":{\"NodeSize\":\"Small\",\"MinExecutors\":\"1\",\"MaxExecutors\":\"3\"}},{\"Source\":{\"TableName\":\"lmsdata\",\"SchemaName\":\"public\"},\"Increment\":{\"IncField\":\"moddate\",\"IdField\":\"id\"},\"Destination\":{\"FileName\":\"publiclmsdata\"},\"SparkConfig\":{\"NodeSize\":\"Small\",\"MinExecutors\":\"1\",\"MaxExecutors\":\"3\"}},{\"Source\":{\"TableName\":\"nonbooking\",\"SchemaName\":\"public\"},\"Increment\":{\"IncField\":\"moddate\",\"IdField\":\"id\"},\"Destination\":{\"FileName\":\"publicnonbooking\"},\"SparkConfig\":{\"NodeSize\":\"Small\",\"MinExecutors\":\"1\",\"MaxExecutors\":\"3\"}},{\"Source\":{\"TableName\":\"ratecomponent\",\"SchemaName\":\"public\"},\"Increment\":{\"IncField\":\"moddate\",\"IdField\":\"id\"},\"Destination\":{\"FileName\":\"publicratecomponent\"},\"SparkConfig\":{\"NodeSize\":\"Small\",\"MinExecutors\":\"1\",\"MaxExecutors\":\"3\"}},{\"Source\":{\"TableName\":\"rateprofile\",\"SchemaName\":\"public\"},\"Increment\":{\"IncField\":\"moddate\",\"IdField\":\"id\"},\"Destination\":{\"FileName\":\"publicrateprofile\"},\"SparkConfig\":{\"NodeSize\":\"Small\",\"MinExecutors\":\"1\",\"MaxExecutors\":\"3\"}},{\"Source\":{\"TableName\":\"route\",\"SchemaName\":\"public\"},\"Increment\":{\"IncField\":\"moddate\",\"IdField\":\"id\"},\"Destination\":{\"FileName\":\"publicroute\"},\"SparkConfig\":{\"NodeSize\":\"Small\",\"MinExecutors\":\"1\",\"MaxExecutors\":\"3\"}},{\"Source\":{\"TableName\":\"thirdparty\",\"SchemaName\":\"public\"},\"Increment\":{\"IncField\":\"moddate\",\"IdField\":\"id\"},\"Destination\":{\"FileName\":\"publicthirdparty\"},\"SparkConfig\":{\"NodeSize\":\"Small\",\"MinExecutors\":\"1\",\"MaxExecutors\":\"3\"}},{\"Source\":{\"TableName\":\"trip\",\"SchemaName\":\"public\"},\"Increment\":{\"IncField\":\"moddate\",\"IdField\":\"id\"},\"Destination\":{\"FileName\":\"publictrip\"},\"SparkConfig\":{\"NodeSize\":\"Small\",\"MinExecutors\":\"1\",\"MaxExecutors\":\"3\"}}]"
FullLoad = "false"
TempContainerName = "temp"
TakeOnPeriod = "{\"extract\":\"1711843200.000000\"}"

import json
from notebookutils import mssparkutils
from pyspark.sql.functions import broadcast, col, count, min, max
from datetime import datetime

## Iterate through the cw_Items parameter
failflag = 0
failflaglist = []
for i in Items :
    try:
        cw_FileName = i["Destination"]["FileName"] + '.parquet'
        IncField = i["Increment"]["IncField"]
        IdField = i["Increment"]["IdField"]
        print(cw_FileName, IncField, IdField)
        copypath = 'abfss://' + TempContainerName + '@' + DataLakeDF + cw_FolderName + '/' + cw_FileName
        t1path = ''
        ## Perform parameter logic
        if FullLoad == "true" : 
            print("FullLoad")
            FinalDF = spark.read.load(copypath, format='parquet') 
            Finalpath = 'abfss://' + ContainerName + '@' + DataLakeDF + cw_FolderName + '/' + cw_FileName
        elif IncField == IdField :
            print("Incremental ID LOAD")
            ##Load the Left File
            path = 'abfss://' + ContainerName + '@' + DataLakeDF + '/' + cw_FolderName + '/' + cw_FileName
            ProdFile = spark.read.load(path, format='parquet')
            ##Load the Right File
            IncrementFile = spark.read.load(copypath, format='parquet')
            IncrementFileZeroCount = IncrementFile.filter(col(IncField).isNull()).count()
            if IncrementFileZeroCount > 0 :
                    print ("IncField contains Null values")
                    raise Exception ("IncField contains Null values")
            unioned = ProdFile.unionByName(IncrementFile, allowMissingColumns=False)
            t1path = 'abfss://' + TempContainerName + '@' + DataLakeDF + cw_FolderName + '/T1_' + cw_FileName
            unioned.write.parquet(t1path, mode='overwrite')
            ##Load the Final File
            FinalDF = spark.read.load(t1path, format='parquet')
            Finalpath = 'abfss://' + ContainerName + '@' + DataLakeDF + '/' + cw_FolderName + '/' + cw_FileName
            if unioned.count() < (0.75 * ProdFile.count()):
                print ("Error when Unioning table " + cw_FileName + " the Left side had " + str(ProdFile.count()) + " rows and the Unioned table has " + str(unioned.count()))
                raise Exception ("Error when Unioning table " + cw_FileName + " the Left side had " + str(ProdFile.count()) + " rows and the Unioned table has " + str(unioned.count()))
            else: 
                print("Union completed Succesfully")
            ##test = unioned.select(JoinFields)
            UnionDistinctCount = unioned.select(IdField).distinct().count()
            UnionCount = unioned.count()
            if UnionDistinctCount != UnionCount :
                    print ("Duplicates when Unioning table " + cw_FileName + " the Unioned table has " + str(UnionCount) + " rows and the Distinct Unioned table has " + str(UnionDistinctCount))
                    raise Exception ("Duplicates when Unioning table " + cw_FileName + " the Unioned table has " + str(UnionCount) + " rows and the Distinct Unioned table has " + str(UnionDistinctCount))
            else: 
                print("Union completed Succesfully")
        elif len(TakeOnPeriod) > 1 :
            print("Rolling DATE LOAD")
            ##Load the Left File
            path = 'abfss://' + ContainerName + '@' + DataLakeDF + '/' + cw_FolderName + '/' + cw_FileName
            ProdFile = spark.read.load(path, format='parquet')

            ##Load the Right File
            IncrementFile = spark.read.load(copypath, format='parquet')
            IncrementFileZeroCountIncField = IncrementFile.filter(col(IncField).isNull()).count()
            IncrementFileZeroCountIdField = IncrementFile.filter(col(IdField).isNull()).count()
            if (IncrementFileZeroCountIncField > 0) or (IncrementFileZeroCountIdField > 0) :
                    print("IncField or IdField contains Null values")
                    raise Exception ("IncField or IdField contains Null values")

            # MinDate = IncrementFile.select(min(IncField))
            # MinDate = str(MinDate.collect()[0][0])
            # print("MinDate from Source System = " + MinDate + " For Table " + cw_FileName) 
            print("MaxDate to remove from DataLake = " + TakeOnPeriod + " For Table " + cw_FileName) 
            # df_with_rows_deleted = ProdFile.filter(IncField + " < '" + MinDate + "'")
            df_with_rows_deleted_TOP = ProdFile.filter(IncField + " < '" + TakeOnPeriod + "'")
            df_with_rows_deleted = df_with_rows_deleted_TOP.join(broadcast(IncrementFile), on = IdField, how = 'left_anti')
            unioned = df_with_rows_deleted.unionByName(IncrementFile, allowMissingColumns=False)
            t1path = 'abfss://' + TempContainerName + '@' + DataLakeDF + cw_FolderName + '/T1_' + cw_FileName
            unioned.write.parquet(t1path, mode='overwrite')
            ##Load the Final File
            FinalDF = spark.read.load(t1path, format='parquet')
            Finalpath = 'abfss://' + ContainerName + '@' + DataLakeDF + '/' + cw_FolderName + '/' + cw_FileName
            if unioned.count() < (0.75 * ProdFile.count()):
                print ("Error when Unioning table " + cw_FileName + " the Left side had " + str(ProdFile.count()) + " rows and the Unioned table has " + str(unioned.count()))
                raise Exception ("Error when Unioning table " + cw_FileName + " the Left side had " + str(ProdFile.count()) + " rows and the Unioned table has " + str(unioned.count()))
            else: 
                print("Union completed Succesfully")
            UnionDistinctCount = unioned.select(IdField).distinct().count()
            UnionCount = unioned.count()
            if UnionDistinctCount != UnionCount :
                    print ("Duplicates when Unioning table " + cw_FileName + " the Unioned table has " + str(UnionCount) + " rows and the Distinct Unioned table has " + str(UnionDistinctCount))
                    raise Exception ("Duplicates when Unioning table " + cw_FileName + " the Unioned table has " + str(UnionCount) + " rows and the Distinct Unioned table has " + str(UnionDistinctCount))
            else: 
                print("Union completed Succesfully")
        elif IncField != IdField :
            print("Incremental DATE LOAD")
            ##Load the Left File
            path = 'abfss://' + ContainerName + '@' + DataLakeDF + '/' + cw_FolderName + '/' + cw_FileName
            ProdFile = spark.read.load(path, format='parquet')
            ##Load the Right File
            IncrementFile = spark.read.load(copypath, format='parquet')
            IncrementFileZeroCountIncField = IncrementFile.filter(col(IncField).isNull()).count()
            IncrementFileZeroCountIdField = IncrementFile.filter(col(IdField).isNull()).count()
            if (IncrementFileZeroCountIncField > 0) or (IncrementFileZeroCountIdField > 0) :
                    print("IncField or IdField contains Null values")
                    raise Exception ("IncField or IdField contains Null values")
            df_with_rows_deleted = ProdFile.join(broadcast(IncrementFile), on = IdField, how = 'left_anti')
            unioned = df_with_rows_deleted.unionByName(IncrementFile, allowMissingColumns=False)
            t1path = 'abfss://' + TempContainerName + '@' + DataLakeDF + cw_FolderName + '/T1_' + cw_FileName
            unioned.write.parquet(t1path, mode='overwrite')
            ##Load the Final File
            FinalDF = spark.read.load(t1path, format='parquet')
            Finalpath = 'abfss://' + ContainerName + '@' + DataLakeDF + '/' + cw_FolderName + '/' + cw_FileName
            if unioned.count() < (0.75 * ProdFile.count()):
                print ("Error when Unioning table " + cw_FileName + " the Left side had " + str(ProdFile.count()) + " rows and the Unioned table has " + str(unioned.count()))
                raise Exception ("Error when Unioning table " + cw_FileName + " the Left side had " + str(ProdFile.count()) + " rows and the Unioned table has " + str(unioned.count()))
            else: 
                print("Union completed Succesfully")
            UnionDistinctCount = unioned.select(IdField).distinct().count()
            UnionCount = unioned.count()
            if UnionDistinctCount != UnionCount :
                    print ("Duplicates when Unioning table " + cw_FileName + " the Unioned table has " + str(UnionCount) + " rows and the Distinct Unioned table has " + str(UnionDistinctCount))
                    raise Exception ("Duplicates when Unioning table " + cw_FileName + " the Unioned table has " + str(UnionCount) + " rows and the Distinct Unioned table has " + str(UnionDistinctCount))
            else: 
                print("Union completed Succesfully")
        else:
            print("Parameters not correctly specified")
            raise ValueError("Parameters not correctly specified")
        print(Finalpath)
        # FinalDF.write.parquet(Finalpath, mode='overwrite')
        print(copypath, t1path)
        ## Remove the temporary tables and directories in the the temp container
        mssparkutils.fs.rm(copypath, True) 
        if t1path != '' :
            mssparkutils.fs.rm(t1path, True) 
    except:
        failflag = 1
        failflaglist += [i]
## Fail pipeline if any iteration failed
if failflag == 1:
    print(failflaglist)
    raise ValueError("One of the table iterations has failed")
